Uses of Class
software.leonov.cells.fluent.FCell

  • Packages that use FCell 
    Package Description
    software.leonov.cells.fluent
    A fluent API for reading and writing Microsoft Excel documents.

    • Uses of FCell in software.leonov.cells.fluent

      Methods in software.leonov.cells.fluent that return FCell 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FCell FSheet.copyCell(FCell from, FCell to)
      Copies the cell-style, cell-type, comment, and value from the source cell to the target cell.
      static FCell FSheet.cutAndPasteCell(FCell from, FCell to)
      Cuts and pastes the cell-style, cell-type, comment, and value from the source cell to the target cell.
      FCell FRow.getCell(int index)
      Returns the specified cell or null if the cell is undefined.
      FCell FRow.getCell(String colref)
      Returns the specified cell or null if the cell is undefined.
      FCell FRow.getOrCreateCell(int index)
      Returns the specified cell.
      FCell FRow.getOrCreateCell(String colref)
      Returns the specified cell.
